==Abilities and Attacks==
''Most attack names are unofficial.''
===Normal===
{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1      = State Shift
|desc_1      = When hit by {{Electro}} or {{Pyro}} attacks, the Stretchy Geo Fungus will enter an Activated or Scorched state respectively, gaining enhanced attacks. A Stretchy Geo Fungus can only undergo state shift once.
* If the Stretchy Geo Fungus is defeated while Activated or Scorched, it may drop {{Item|Inactivated Fungal Nucleus}}, {{Item|Dormant Fungal Nucleus}}, and {{Item|Robust Fungal Nucleus}}, while the drop rates for {{Item|Fungal Spores}}, {{Item|Luminescent Pollen}}, and {{Item|Crystalline Cyst Dust}} will greatly reduce.

|name_2      = Stretch Spin
|desc_2      = Stretches itself, charges and spins its head around, dealing '''30% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
* '''Activated:''' Speed increased, cooldown reduced.
* '''Scorched:''' Speed reduced, DMG increased to '''60% ATK''', knockback increased.
|caption_2   = Normal
|file_2_2    = Stretchy Geo Fungus Stretch Spin 2
|caption_2_2 = Activated
|file_2_3    = Stretchy Geo Fungus Stretch Spin 3
|caption_2_3 = Scorched

|name_3      = Roll
|desc_3      = Rolls towards the player, dealing '''60% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} on hit.
* '''Activated:''' Speed increased, cooldown reduced.
* '''Scorched:''' Speed reduced, DMG increased to '''100% ATK''', knockback increased.
|caption_3   = Normal
|file_3_2    = Stretchy Geo Fungus Roll 2
|caption_3_2 = Activated
|file_3_3    = Stretchy Geo Fungus Roll 3
|caption_3_3 = Scorched
}}

===Fabulous Fungus Frenzy===
<section begin="fff skills"/>
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy       = Stretchy Geo Fungus

|name_1      = Skill: Rocks Fall
|desc_1      = Leaps high up and initiates a devastating Plunging Attack that deals '''1154% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} to nearby opponents and knocks them back. If it hits targets affected by {{Geo}}, it will drain '''12 [[Gauge Unit]]s''' of their Geo element.<br />''"This kind of Fungus seems to be a natural-born mining master," Paimon theorizes...''
|file_1      = Stretchy Geo Fungus Rocks Fall

|name_2      = Bedrock Line
|desc_2      = Strengthens its own resistance to attacks, and will taunt nearby opponents for '''8''' seconds. However, it may not be able to draw enemy fire to itself if other Fungi in the team are attacking the enemies very frequently.

|name_3      = Hard Knock
|desc_3      = Deals '''118% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} to nearby opponents using its flapping cap. If it hits targets affected by {{Geo}}, it will drain '''2 Gauge Units''' of their Geo element.
}}<!--

==Descriptions==
{{Description|A spore organism of some intelligence. It possesses extreme adaptability.<br />These shrooms' caps have hard outer layers derived from concretions of Geo energy. Its bodily structure is also quite likely to be denser than others of its kind.|[[Archive]]}}

==Trivia==
* Despite being called a [[Geo]] enemy, it has no attacks capable of dealing Geo damage.
